EmailTemplate.name: 17.NokION.XLE.Retail.N.G.N.17804.Retail Nurture.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Digital transformation for unified retail commerce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Digital transformation for unified retail commerce As a technology leader in the retail industry, you’re probably challenged with transforming your IT infrastructure to support multi-channel digital capabilities to improve customer satisfaction.Satisfying customers means you need to develop your technology infrastructure to enables quick and easy deployment and management of innovative services and digital functionality. Want to learn more? Read our use case, “Digital Transformation for Unified Retail Commerce <[[https://resources.ext.nokia.com/asset/201539]]>.” See how Nokia can help you build a robust technology foundation to increase operational efficiency and lower your costs. Sincerely,
Cindy Bergevin
Head of Retail Marketing, Nokia Email: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]>
Visit https://networks.nokia.com/retail <[[https://networks.nokia.com/retail]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
